name: Dungeons and Miners
description:
The most simple operation, the most primitive of fun! So that you can not stop ...... each layer has a completely random levels! Your goal is to challenge as many layers!
You only need a simple arrow keys on the screen to control or avoid eating everything in sight.
Not only easy and fascinating game currency (gold) is in the game you can easily get!
Hope this is worth a download, the next game is worth your memories!
